group.name: XML-ized web sites
group.sample: This page shows a much more complex example that shows how powerful is the style separation and how powerful XML+XSLT can be even for web publishing.
This pages shows the XML-ized version of the Apache Jakarta web site.

group.name: XML Entity Catalogs
group.sample: External entities (e.g. DTDs, symbols, character entity sets, images) are resolved to local copies of the resources. The catalog manager facilitates the mapping between public identifiers or system identifiers and other system identifiers.

group.name: Static Content
group.sample: This is an example of XML-FO document translated into PDF by Apache FOP.
An example of an SVG document rendered into a PNG image.

A version of this page rendered as a series of SVG images embedded within an HTML page. This example uses the 'fragment extractor' transformer and generator to automatically extract the images and feed them through a separate pipeline.
